amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for initiating any new competitive sourcing studies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1731 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 361.

action.text: Amendment SA 1731 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S11624-11625; text: CR S11624) To prohibit the use of funds for initiating any new competitive sourcing studies.
